item.title: PARKING BRAKE Lights – Park Brake Light – Anti-skid Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided AOM decrements are applied for anti-skid inoperative operations.

numlitem.para: When releasing parking brakes, verify that anti-skid indicator light on P5 panel extinguishes. If the anti-skid light does not extinguish, the flight will be with the anti-skid system inoperative.
Autobrakes will not be available. Do not select RTO.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 3a and observe MEL 32-42-1-0-1 Limitations.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Anti-skid Light "SYSTEM INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

numlitem.para: Accomplish Dispatch Maintenance Procedure 32-42-1-0-1 Maintenance Procedure.
